# Week 5 (2019-11-30)

_subject to change_


## Objective

At the end of this lesson, learners will be able to:

1. Demonstrate the ability to work with date values,  

2. Demonstrate the ability to work with text strings, using regular expressions (regex),

3. Use regex in the context of {dplyr} `filter()` and `select()` functions,
